bill.title: Task Force; Policy; Regulation of Pharmacy Benefit Management Companies; Patients Right to Select Their Own Pharmacy Provider
bill.description: Requesting The Governor Of The State Of Hawaii To Convene A Task Force To Review Policies And Procedures For State Funded Drug Coverage Programs And Services.

history.action: (H) To be offered.
(H) Offered
(H) Referred to LAB/HUS/HLT, CPC, FIN, referral sheet 39
(H) Resolution scheduled to be heard by LAB/HUS/HLT on Tuesday, 03-29-11 10:10AM in conference room 309.

(H) The committees on LAB recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Rhoads, Yamashita, Aquino, Cullen, Ichiyama, M. Lee, Fontaine, Johanson; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 4 Excused: Representative(s) Luke, Saiki, Souki, Takumi.

(H) The committees on HUS recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Mizuno, Jordan, Belatti, Hanohano, Morikawa, Yamane, Pine; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) C. Lee, Wooley, Ching.

(H) The committees on HLT recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 7 Ayes: Representative(s) Yamane, Morikawa, Belatti, Hanohano, Jordan, Mizuno, Pine; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) C. Lee, Wooley, Ching.
(H) Reported from LAB/HUS/HLT (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1292) as amended in HD 1, recommending referral to CPC.
(H) Report adopted. referred to the committee(s) on CPC as amended in HD 1 with none voting no and Belatti, Say, Takumi, Tokioka, Wooley excused.
(H) Re-referred to LAB/HUS/HLT, FIN, referral sheet 54
(H) Scheduled for decision making on Wednesday, 04-13-11 10:30AM in conference room 308.

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 14 Ayes: Representative(s) M. Oshiro, M. Lee, Choy, Cullen, Har, Hashem, Ichiyama, Jordan, Kawakami, C. Lee, Morikawa, Tokioka, Yamashita, Riviere; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Chong, Marumoto, Ward.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1708) as amended in HD 2, recommending adoption.
(H) Adopted as amended in HD 2 with none voting no and Chong, Herkes, Kawakami, McKelvey, Thielen, Tokioka excused.
(H) Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 605).
(S) Referred to HTH, WAM.
(S) Waived referral to HTH, WAM.
(S) One Day Notice 04-27-11.
(S) Resolution Adopted. Transmitted to House.
(H) Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 672).
(H) Resolution adopted in final form.
